actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for judicial reform in criminal cases.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Administrative Office of United States Courts to examine methods for improving scheduling of criminal cases in district courts. Directs the judges of each district court to establish and make public sentencing guidelines. Requires the court to state in the record the reasons for any deviation from such guidelines. Reduces the number preemptory of jury challenges.

titles.title: A bill to provide for judicial reform in criminal cases.
